1103410.name: The Tower Of TigerQiuQiu
1103410.description:
Hi,
Use asdw or arrow key to move
Use jkui or alt enter ctr to fire
Use Ese to exit game
Use alt+enter to full screen

About:
The Tower of TigerQiuQiu is a nes-like game collection

include：Super Tigerio、Bomber Tiger、Ninja Tiger:QiuQiu、Tiger Tank G、Tiger 1952

Super Tigerio：In the game, the player will take on the role of Tigerio,
Who will have to jump through obstacles on the path and attack to kill the monsters to get the gold Cup

Bomber Tiger：A Tiger put bomber to destroy all the enemy ，find a door to escape the Maze.

Ninja Tiger:QiuQiu: A Ninja game , the Tiger QiuQiu is a Ninja , Jump up to the hill , and kill all enemy;

Tiger Tank G：Destroy the enemy's tank factory.And Protect your base from the enemy to win the game.

Tiger 1952：Break through the enemy escort fleet and destroy the enemy heavy bombers.

Nyaa Invaders：Alien cats are hungry and ready to invade the earth. If you fly the most advanced cat lunch box spaceship, you must feed them before they starve.
Save the earth!
1103410.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
